column1: Uchi////From all the reviews and hype from Uchi
column2: I expected more from this place. Don't get me wrong
column3: all the food was delicious. Never had sushi Japanese food like this
column4: its a great experience. It was a special occasion
column5: we came here for a birthday dinner. There was only 4 of us for this event
column6: but Uchi is able to accommodate large groups
column7: so don't turn away if you're thinking that. They have a private room for larger parties
column8: but make sure you call and make a reservation.
